actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-343, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 288 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Providing for consideration of the resolution in the House.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 117.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 288) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 288 (making further continuing appropriations for FY 1994).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 288) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.
